contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Italian comune | name = Quarrata | official_name = CittÃ  di Quarrata | native_name = | image_skyline = Quarrata.jpg | imagesize = | image_alt = | image_caption = | image_shield = | shield_alt = | image_map = | map_alt = | map_caption = | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_map_alt = | latd = 43 |latm = 50 |lats = 51 |latNS = N | longd = 10 |longm = 59 |longs = 0 |longEW = E | coordinates_type = type:city(23,884)_region:IT | coordinates_display = title | coordinates_footnotes = | region = [[Tuscany]] | province = [[Province of Pistoia|Pistoia]] (PT) | frazioni = Barba, Buriano, Caserana, Casini, Catena, Ferruccia, Forrottoli, Lucciano, Montemagno, Montorio, Olmi, Santonuovo, [[Tizzana]], Valenzatico, Vignole | mayor_party = [[Democratic Party (Italy)|PD]] | mayor = Marco Mazzanti | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 46.0 | population_footnotes = <ref name="istat">All demographics and other statistics: Italian statistical institute [[National Institute of Statistics (Italy)|Istat]].</ref> | population_total = 24600 | population_as_of = 1 January 2008 | pop_density_footnotes = | population_demonym = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = 48 | twin1 = | twin1_country = | saint = | day = | postal_code = 51039 | area_code = 0573 | website = {{official|http://www.comune.quarrata.pt.it/}} | footnotes = }} '''Quarrata''' is a ''[[comune]]'' (municipality) in the [[Province of Pistoia]] in the [[Italy|Italian]] region [[Tuscany]], located about 30 km west of [[Florence]] and about 10 km south of [[Pistoia]]. ==Twin towns== *{{flagicon|ROM}} [[Vaslui]], Romania *{{flagicon|SADR}} [[Agounit]], [[Western Sahara]] ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== {{commonscat|Quarrata}} * [http://www.comune.quarrata.pt.it/ Official website] <br clear=all> {{Province of Pistoia}} [[Category:Cities and towns in Tuscany]] {{Tuscany-geo-stub}}
